title: Cornwell on Shakespeare
itunes:title: Cornwell on Shakespeare
itunes:subtitle: We are joined by the world-renowned historical novelist Bernard Cornwell who shares the story behind his latest book Fools and Mortals, which explores the world of Elizabethan theatre and the man at the centre of it
description:
We are joined by the world-renowned historical novelist Bernard Cornwell who shares the story behind his latest book Fools and Mortals, which explores the world of Elizabethan theatre and the man at the centre of it

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
